page.title: 02GAMES IN A WILLOUGHBY HOME
page.content: I have got a game called{frustration which 2-4 people can play. You choose a colour man and you have to knock out your opponents men.{Headache}is a similar game.{Yahtzee}is when you have five dice and you shake the dice and throw them in a tray.The idea is to get the most points.The one with the most is the winner.{Football}is when you have red or yellow men.There is a ball and you must kick the ball, or try to, in to your opponent's goal. {Payday}is a great game.You have a plastic pound sign which is your counter.You get some money and then your'e off.You can buy things and you get letters just like in real life.You get bills and postcards.Sometimes you can get a reward.If you buy something and land on "sell"you get up to Â£1400. It takes hours to finish.
